categories: Category:The Old Republic: Blood of the Empire

nodes.text: The Old Republic 4: Blood of the Empire, Part 1

The Old Republic 4: Blood of the Empire, Part 1 is the fourth issue in the Star Wars: The Old Republic comic series and is a re-release of the webcomic The Old Republic, Blood of the Empire Act 1: Shades of the Sith. Blood of the Empire, Part 1 was released by Dark Horse Comics on October 6, 2010, and collected with the other two parts of the arc in Star Wars: The Old Republic Volume 1: Blood of the Empire.

After hundreds of years, the Sith Empire has returned to the galaxy, determined to crush the Republic that sent them into exile. For young Sith Teneb Kel, it is his only chance to rise above his lowly beginnings as a slave and prove his worth to the Dark Council. Yet their mission for him is unexpected. He will not hunt Jedi, but rather, a fellow Sith—the Emperor's apprentice!
